      @GetMapping("/allBookingsEmployee") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView allBookingsEmployee() throws EmployeeNotFoundException
      Get mapping for retrieving all room bookings of an employee.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView object containing the view and the list of room bookings.
      Throws:
      EmployeeNotFoundException - if the employee is not found.

    • createBookingEmployee

      @GetMapping("/createBookingEmployee/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createBookingEmployee(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws RoomNotFoundException, ExecutionException, InterruptedException, EmployeeNotFoundException
      Get mapping for creating a room booking for an employee.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the room to be booked.
      model - The Model object for the view.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView object containing the view and the new booking.
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found.
      ExecutionException - if an execution error occurs.
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting.
      EmployeeNotFoundException - if the employee is not found.

    • createBookingEmployee

      @PostMapping("/createBookingEmployee") public String createBookingEmployee(@Valid @Valid RoomBooking booking, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult) throws RoomNotAvailableException, RoomNotFoundException
      Post mapping for creating a room booking for an employee.
      Parameters:
      booking - The roombooking object to be created.
      bindingResult - The BindingResult object for data binding and validation.
      Returns:
      Redirect URL after creating the booking.
      Throws:
      RoomNotAvailableException - if the room is not available.
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found.

    • updateBooking

      @GetMapping("/updateBooking/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateBooking(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, RoomNotFoundException, EmployeeNotFoundException
      Get mapping for updating a room booking.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the booking to be updated.
      model - The Model object for the view.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView object containing the view and the booking to be updated.
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found.
      ExecutionException - if an execution error occurs.
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting.
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found.
      EmployeeNotFoundException - if the employee is not found.

    • updateBooking

      @PostMapping("/updateBooking") public String updateBooking(@Valid @Valid RoomBooking booking, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, RoomNotAvailableException, RoomNotFoundException, EmployeeNotFoundException
      Post mapping for updating a room booking.
      Parameters:
      booking - The updated roombooking object.
      bindingResult - The BindingResult object for data binding and validation.
      Returns:
      Redirect URL after updating the booking.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if an execution error occurs.
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting.
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found.
      RoomNotAvailableException - if the room is not available.
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found.
      EmployeeNotFoundException - if the employee is not found.

      Returns:

    • deleteBookingAdmin

      @GetMapping("/deleteBooking/{id}") public String deleteBookingAdmin(@PathVariable Long id) throws RoomNotFoundException, RoomDeletionNotPossibleException
      Get mapping for deleting a room booking of an admin.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the booking to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Redirect URL after deleting the booking.
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if the room is not found.
      RoomDeletionNotPossibleException - if the room deletion is not possible.
